text: legislative findings and purpose the general court finds that it is in the best interest of the littoral owners around big pea porridge pond in madison and conway and the people of new hampshire to control the waters on big pea porridge pond and to establish a constant water level by allowing the construction of a dam at its natural outlet dam construction authorized the pea porridge pond association is specifically authorized pursuant to rsa to construct a dam at the natural outlet of big pea porridge pond in the town of madison
